fields.field: Alternative PN 865060663015. Big cap to smooth inrush current on the LED strip. LEDs are 24V, so make sure are rated to at least 2x that.

property.name: Comments
property.value: Alternative PN 865060663015. Big cap to smooth inrush current on the LED strip. LEDs are 24V, so make sure are rated to at least 2x that.

fields.field: An NMOS with relatively low Rds on, that can confortably siwtch at 3V3 and handle switching 150mA@24V. The 2N7002 is cheap and cheerful and available from multiple manuf.
